query: SELECT t.id, t.codigo, COUNT(e.id) as total_eventos FROM turmas t LEFT JOIN eventos e ON e.turmaId = t.id GROUP BY t.id, t.codigo HAVING total_eventos > 0 LIMIT 10
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT t.id, t.codigo, COUNT(e.id) as total_eventos FROM turmas t LEFT JOIN eventos e ON e.turmaId = t.id GROUP BY t.id, t.codigo HAVING total_eventos > 0 LIMIT 10
